verses.verse: וַֽיְהִי֙ <WH1961> came בִּשְׁנַ֣ת <WH8141> year שָׁלֹ֔שׁ <WH7969> Now it came to pass in the third לְהוֹשֵׁ֥עַ <WH1954> of Hoshea בֶּן־ <WH1121> son אֵלָ֖ה <WH425> of Elah מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel מָלַ֛ךְ <WH4427> began to reign חִזְקִיָּ֥ה <WH2396> [that] Hezekiah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son אָחָ֖ז <WH271> of Ahaz מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> king יְהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> of Judah

בֶּן־ <WH1121> old עֶשְׂרִ֨ים <WH6242> Twenty וְחָמֵ֤שׁ <WH2568> and five שָׁנָה֙ <WH8141> years הָיָ֣ה <WH1961> become בְמָלְכ֔וֹ <WH4427> was he when he began to reign וְעֶשְׂרִ֤ים <WH6242> twenty וָתֵ֙שַׁע֙ <WH8672> and nine שָׁנָ֔ה <WH8141> years מָלַ֖ךְ <WH4427> and he reigned בִּירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> in Jerusalem וְשֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> name אִמּ֔וֹ <WH517> His mother's אֲבִ֖י <WH21> also [was] Abi בַּת־ <WH1323> the daughter זְכַרְיָֽה׃ <WH2148> of Zachariah

וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <WH6213> And he did הַיָּשָׁ֖ר <WH3477> [that which was] right בְּעֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> in the sight יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD כְּכֹ֥ל <WH3605> to all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after עָשָׂ֖ה <WH6213> did דָּוִ֥ד <WH1732> according to all that David אָבִֽיו׃ <WH1> his father

ה֣וּא ׀ <WH1931> He הֵסִ֣יר <WH5493> He removed אֶת־ <WH853> הַבָּמ֗וֹת <WH1116> the high places וְשִׁבַּר֙ <WH7665> and brake אֶת־ <WH853> הַמַּצֵּבֹ֔ת <WH4676> the images וְכָרַ֖ת <WH3772> and cut down אֶת־ <WH853> הָֽאֲשֵׁרָ֑ה <WH842> the groves וְכִתַּת֩ <WH3807> and brake in pieces נְחַ֨שׁ <WH5175> serpent הַנְּחֹ֜שֶׁת <WH5178> the brasen אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after עָשָׂ֣ה <WH6213> had made מֹשֶׁ֗ה <WH4872> that Moses כִּ֣י <WH3588> for עַד־ <WH5704> until הַיָּמִ֤ים <WH3117> for unto those days הָהֵ֙מָּה֙ <WH1992> those הָי֤וּ <WH1961> become בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel מְקַטְּרִ֣ים <WH6999> did burn incense ל֔וֹ וַיִּקְרָא־ <WH7121> to it and he called ל֖וֹ נְחֻשְׁתָּֽן׃ <WH5180> it Nehushtan

בַּיהוָ֥ה <WH3068> in the LORD אֱלֹהֵֽי־ <WH430> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel בָּטָ֑ח <WH982> He trusted וְאַחֲרָ֞יו <WH310> so that after לֹא־ <WH3808> none הָיָ֣ה <WH1961> become כָמֹ֗הוּ <WH3644> like בְּכֹל֙ <WH3605> all מַלְכֵ֣י <WH4428> him was none like him among all the kings יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> of Judah וַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who הָי֖וּ <WH1961> become לְפָנָֽיו׃ <WH6440> nor [any] that were before

וַיִּדְבַּק֙ <WH1692> For he clave בַּֽיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> to the LORD לֹא־ <WH3808> did not סָ֖ר <WH5493> [and] departed מֵאַֽחֲרָ֑יו <WH310> not from following וַיִּשְׁמֹר֙ <WH8104> him but kept מִצְוֹתָ֔יו <WH4687> his commandments אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which צִוָּ֥ה <WH6680> commanded יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> which the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <WH4872> Moses

וְהָיָ֤ה <WH1961> become יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> And the LORD עִמּ֔וֹ <WH5973> with בְּכֹ֥ל <WH3605> all manner אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> he יֵצֵ֖א <WH3318> whithersoever he went forth יַשְׂכִּ֑יל <WH7919> was with him [and] he prospered וַיִּמְרֹ֥ד <WH4775> and he rebelled בְּמֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> against the king אַשּׁ֖וּר <WH804> of Assyria וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> and did not עֲבָדֽוֹ׃ <WH5647> and served

הֽוּא־ <WH1931> He הִכָּ֧ה <WH5221> He smote אֶת־ <WH853> פְּלִשְׁתִּ֛ים <WH6430> the Philistines עַד־ <WH5704> far עַזָּ֖ה <WH5804> [even] unto Gaza וְאֶת־ <WH853> גְּבוּלֶ֑יהָ <WH1366> and the borders מִמִּגְדַּ֥ל <WH4026> thereof from the tower נוֹצְרִ֖ים <WH5341> of the watchmen עַד־ <WH5704> far עִ֥יר <WH5892> city מִבְצָֽר׃ <WH4013> to the fenced פ

וַֽיְהִ֞י <WH1961> become בַּשָּׁנָ֤ה <WH8141> year הָֽרְבִיעִית֙ <WH7243> And it came to pass in the fourth לַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> of king חִזְקִיָּ֔הוּ <WH2396> Hezekiah הִ֚יא <WH1931> which הַשָּׁנָ֣ה <WH8141> year הַשְּׁבִיעִ֔ית <WH7637> which [was] the seventh לְהוֹשֵׁ֥עַ <WH1954> of Hoshea בֶּן־ <WH1121> son אֵלָ֖ה <WH425> of Elah מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel עָלָ֞ה <WH5927> came up שַׁלְמַנְאֶ֧סֶר <WH8022> [that] Shalmaneser מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king אַשּׁ֛וּר <WH804> of Assyria עַל־ <WH5921> against שֹׁמְר֖וֹן <WH8111> against Samaria וַיָּ֥צַר <WH6696> and besieged עָלֶֽיהָ׃ <WH5921> against

וַֽיִּלְכְּדֻ֗הָ <WH3920> they took מִקְצֵה֙ <WH7097> And at the end שָׁלֹ֣שׁ <WH7969> of three שָׁנִ֔ים <WH8141> years בִּשְׁנַת־ <WH8141> year שֵׁ֖שׁ <WH8337> it [even] in the sixth לְחִזְקִיָּ֑ה <WH2396> of Hezekiah הִ֣יא <WH1931> which שְׁנַת־ <WH8141> year תֵּ֗שַׁע <WH8672> that [is] the ninth לְהוֹשֵׁ֙עַ֙ <WH1954> of Hoshea מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel נִלְכְּדָ֖ה <WH3920> was taken שֹׁמְרֽוֹן׃ <WH8111> Samaria

וַיֶּ֧גֶל <WH1540> did carry away מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> And the king אַשּׁ֛וּר <WH804> of Assyria אֶת־ <WH853> יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Israel אַשּׁ֑וּרָה <WH804> unto Assyria וַיַּנְחֵ֞ם <WH5148> and put בַּחְלַ֧ח <WH2477> them in Halah וּבְחָב֛וֹר <WH2249> and in Habor נְהַ֥ר <WH5104> [by] the river גּוֹזָ֖ן <WH1470> of Gozan וְעָרֵ֥י <WH5892> and in the cities מָדָֽי׃ <WH4074> of the Medes

עַ֣ל ׀ <WH5921> and אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> they לֹֽא־ <WH3808> neither שָׁמְע֗וּ <WH8085> Because they obeyed בְּקוֹל֙ <WH6963> not the voice יְהוָ֣ה <WH3069> God אֱלֹהֵיהֶ֔ם <WH430> their God וַיַּעַבְרוּ֙ <WH5674> but transgressed אֶת־ <WH853> בְּרִית֔וֹ <WH1285> his covenant אֵ֚ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> after צִוָּ֔ה <WH6680> commanded מֹשֶׁ֖ה <WH4872> [and] all that Moses עֶ֣בֶד <WH5650> the servant יְהוָ֑ה <WH3069> God וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> nor שָׁמְע֖וּ <WH8085> and would not hear וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> neither עָשֽׂוּ׃ <WH6213> [them] nor do פ

וּבְאַרְבַּע֩ <WH702> four עֶשְׂרֵ֨ה <WH6240> teen שָׁנָ֜ה <WH8141> year לַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> of king חִזְקִיָּ֗ה <WH2396> Hezekiah עָלָ֞ה <WH5927> come up סַנְחֵרִ֤יב <WH5576> did Sennacherib מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king אַשּׁוּר֙ <WH804> of Assyria עַ֣ל <WH5921> against כָּל־ <WH3605> all עָרֵ֧י <WH5892> cities יְהוּדָ֛ה <WH3063> of Judah הַבְּצֻר֖וֹת <WH1219> against all the fenced וַֽיִּתְפְּשֵֽׂם׃ <WH8610> and took

וַיִּשְׁלַ֣ח <WH7971> sent חִזְקִיָּ֣ה <WH2396> And Hezekiah מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king יְהוּדָ֣ה <WH3063> of Judah אֶל־ <WH413> to מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> to the king אַשּׁוּר֩ ׀ <WH804> of Assyria לָכִ֨ישָׁה ׀ <WH3923> to Lachish לֵאמֹ֤ר ׀ <WH559> saying חָטָ֙אתִי֙ <WH2398> I have offended שׁ֣וּב <WH7725> return מֵֽעָלַ֔י <WH5921> and אֵ֛ת <WH853> אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> whatever תִּתֵּ֥ן <WH5414> from me that which thou puttest עָלַ֖י <WH5921> on אֶשָּׂ֑א <WH5375> on me will I bear וַיָּ֨שֶׂם <WH7760> appointed מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> And the king אַשּׁ֜וּר <WH804> of Assyria עַל־ <WH5921> of חִזְקִיָּ֣ה <WH2396> unto Hezekiah מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king יְהוּדָ֗ה <WH3063> of Judah שְׁלֹ֤שׁ <WH7969> three מֵאוֹת֙ <WH3967> hundred כִּכַּר־ <WH3603> talents כֶּ֔סֶף <WH3701> of silver וּשְׁלֹשִׁ֖ים <WH7970> and thirty כִּכַּ֥ר <WH3603> talents זָהָֽב׃ <WH2091> of gold

וַיִּתֵּן֙ <WH5414> gave חִזְקִיָּ֔ה <WH2396> And Hezekiah אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַכֶּ֖סֶף <WH3701> [him] all the silver הַנִּמְצָ֣א <WH4672> that was found בֵית־ <WH1004> in the house יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD וּבְאֹצְר֖וֹת <WH214> and in the treasures בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> house הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> of the king's

בָּעֵ֣ת <WH6256> At that time הַהִ֗יא <WH1931> he קִצַּ֨ץ <WH7112> cut off חִזְקִיָּ֜ה <WH2396> did Hezekiah אֶת־ <WH853> דַּלְת֨וֹת <WH1817> [the gold from] the doors הֵיכַ֤ל <WH1964> of the temple יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD וְאֶת־ <WH853> הָאֹ֣מְנ֔וֹת <WH547> and [from] the pillars אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which צִפָּ֔ה <WH6823> had overlaid חִזְקִיָּ֖ה <WH2396> which Hezekiah מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> of Judah וַֽיִּתְּנֵ֖ם <WH5414> and gave לְמֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> it to the king אַשּֽׁוּר׃ <WH804> of Assyria פ

וַיִּשְׁלַ֣ח <WH7971> sent מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> And the king אַשּׁ֡וּר <WH804> of Assyria אֶת־ <WH853> תַּרְתָּ֥ן <WH8661> Tartan וְאֶת־ <WH853> רַב־ סָרִ֣יס ׀ <WH7249> and Rabsaris וְאֶת־ <WH853> רַב־ שָׁקֵ֨ה <WH7262> and Rabshakeh מִן־ <WH4480> from לָכִ֜ישׁ <WH3923> from Lachish אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמֶּ֧לֶךְ <WH4428> to king חִזְקִיָּ֛הוּ <WH2396> Hezekiah בְּחֵ֥יל <WH2426> host כָּבֵ֖ד <WH3515> with a great יְרוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> against Jerusalem וַֽיַּעֲלוּ֙ <WH5927> And they went up וַיָּבֹ֣אוּ <WH935> and came יְרוּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> to Jerusalem וַיַּעֲל֣וּ <WH5927> And when they were come up וַיָּבֹ֗אוּ <WH935> they came וַיַּֽעַמְדוּ֙ <WH5975> and stood בִּתְעָלַת֙ <WH8585> by the conduit הַבְּרֵכָ֣ה <WH1295> pool הָֽעֶלְיוֹנָ֔ה <WH5945> of the upper אֲשֶׁ֕ר <WH834> which בִּמְסִלַּ֖ת <WH4546> which [is] in the highway שְׂדֵ֥ה <WH7704> field כוֹבֵֽס׃ <WH3526> of the fuller's

וַֽיִּקְרְאוּ֙ <WH7121> And when they had called אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> to the king וַיֵּצֵ֧א <WH3318> there came out אֲלֵהֶ֛ם <WH413> about אֶלְיָקִ֥ים <WH471> to them Eliakim בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son חִלְקִיָּ֖הוּ <WH2518> of Hilkiah אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who עַל־ <WH5921> was over הַבָּ֑יִת <WH1004> which [was] over the household וְשֶׁבְנָה֙ <WH7644> and Shebna הַסֹּפֵ֔ר <WH5608> the scribe וְיוֹאָ֥ח <WH3098> and Joah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son אָסָ֖ף <WH623> of Asaph הַמַּזְכִּֽיר׃ <WH2142> the recorder

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said אֲלֵהֶם֙ <WH413> about רַב־ שָׁקֵ֔ה <WH7262> And Rabshakeh אִמְרוּ־ <WH559> unto them Speak נָ֖א <WH4994> now אֶל־ <WH413> to חִזְקִיָּ֑הוּ <WH2396> ye now to Hezekiah כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֞ר <WH559> Thus saith הַמֶּ֤לֶךְ <WH4428> king הַגָּדוֹל֙ <WH1419> the great מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> the king אַשּׁ֔וּר <WH804> of Assyria מָ֧ה <WH4100> What הַבִּטָּח֛וֹן <WH986> What confidence הַזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> is this אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which בָּטָֽחְתָּ׃ <WH982> [is] this wherein thou trustest

אָמַ֙רְתָּ֙ <WH559> Thou sayest אַךְ־ <WH389> only דְּבַר־ <WH1697> act שְׂפָתַ֔יִם <WH8193> (but [they are but] vain עֵצָ֥ה <WH6098> advice וּגְבוּרָ֖ה <WH1369> and strength לַמִּלְחָמָ֑ה <WH4421> for the war עַתָּה֙ <WH6258> henceforth עַל־ <WH5921> on מִ֣י <WH4310> whom בָטַ֔חְתָּ <WH982> Now on whom dost thou trust כִּ֥י <WH3588> that מָרַ֖דְתָּ <WH4775> that thou rebellest בִּֽי׃
